Title: Milka - A Film About Taboos
Writer: Veikko Aaltonen, Seppo Heinonen, Rauni Mollberg, Timo K. Mukka (novel), Jussi Niilekselä
Actors: Irma Huntus, Leena Suomu, Matti Turunen, Eikka Lehtonen
Plot: In a small Finnish Lapland community, Milka, an innocent 14-year-old girl lives with her mother, misses her dead father and prays God to show her what love is. For haymaking, they employ a simple but hard-working field hand, nicknamed Christ-Devil, who decides to stay and become the man of the house, courting both the mother and daughter. Eventually he leaves them both, and Milka has his child.
